## FlowTableCellSelection class

Represents a selection inside a flow table cell

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
/** @sealed */
export declare class FlowTableCellSelection extends FlowTableCellSelectionBase 
```
<b>Extends:</b> FlowTableCellSelectionBase
